Split gtsummary Table

Source: R/tbl_split.R
tbl_split.Rd

Split gtsummary Table

tbl_split(x, variables)

# S3 method for tbl_split
print(x, ...)

Arguments

x

gtsummary table
variables

variables to split gtsummary table at
...

not used

Value

tbl_split object

Possible Changes

  • Function may be migrated to the gtsummary package

  • May update print method within R markdown to add a page break between tables

See also

Other gtsummary-related functions: add_inline_forest_plot(), as_ggplot(), gts_add_p_footnotes(), gtsummary_butcher(), style_tbl_compact(), tbl_2way_summary(), theme_gtsummary_msk()

Examples

library(gtsummary)

tbl <-
  tbl_summary(trial) %>%
  tbl_split(variables = c(marker, grade))
